players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie is dead. We need to work together to find who did this. I think we should pay close attention to how everyone reacts."
You: "Bob is the mafioso. We must vote him out now before he kills again."
Bob: "Accusing me so quickly doesn’t make sense. Alice, why are you so sure? If you’re the detective, why not share any proof instead of jumping to conclusions?"

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
